name: Nekonom IV
description:
NEKONOM IV named after HR Giger's iconic Necronom IV (1976), the painting which ultimately originated the ALIEN design later used in Ridley Scott's ALIEN (1979). This is a homage to HR Giger and also to Persona 5 (Morgana / Mona and Ryuji / Skull references are clear here). Possibly my most absurd and craziest drawing / painting / animation so far. You can call it "Necromona IV" if you like.

5th and final piece from the series of 2D animated paintings inspired by ALIEN.

1080 X 1080 mp4

Original drawing, digital painting / illustration and animation by Zamahel
